headline: Scale Biosciences and Revvity’s BioLegend Launch First-of-its-Kind Solution for High Parameter Protein Profiling of Single Cells
summary: SAN DIEGO, November 19, 2024--Scale Biosciences and Revvity’s BioLegend launch first-of-its-kind solution for high parameter protein profiling of single cells.

raw.headline: Scale Biosciences and Revvity’s BioLegend Launch First-of-its-Kind Solution for High Parameter Protein Profiling of Single Cells

headline: Revvity to Present at 7th Annual Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., November 19, 2024--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), will present at the 7th Annual Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference on Tuesday, December 3, 2024, at 8:20 a.m. ET in Coral Gables, FL.
